title: 梁繼平: 請捐款支持HKDC

replies.msg:
羅冠聰: HKDC 和Hong Kong Watch 成功協助我跟「蓬佩奧」面談.
https://lihkg.com/thread/2120300/page/1

Hong Kong Watch籌款數字達到目標的94%.
https://www.justgiving.com/campaign/hongkongwatch2020

不過, HKDC籌款數字依然極少.  今日已大幅上升, 但都只有目標的14%.
https://www.gofundme.com/f/weareallhongkongers

而家, 梁繼平都幫手告急, 叫人捐款支持HKDC.

http://twitter.com/BrianLeungKP/status/1286890444358483968
